mapper.select: SELECT sm.site_name siteHostName,sm2.site_name siteGuestName,js.job_success_count,js.job_failed_count,js.job_running_count,js.job_waiting_count,sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id=js.site_host_id and sm2.id=js.site_guest_id

SELECT (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS siteHostName, (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_guest_id) AS siteGuestName, (SELECT sm.institutions FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS institutions, js.job_success_count,js.job_failed_count,js.job_running_count,js.job_waiting_count FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_host_id in (select * from (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions !=#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status=2 order by institutions asc, site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.pageSize} ) tmp )

SELECT sm2.institutions,sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCountForInstitutions,sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCountForInstitutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) group by sm2.institutions

SELECT (case when sm2.institutions = #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} then sm.institutions else sm2.institutions end) as institutions, sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCountForInstitutions,sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCountForInstitutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date=#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE}
and (sm.institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} || sm2.institutions=#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions}) group by sm2.institutions ,sm.institutions order by institutions limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.pageSize}

SELECT count(1) institutionsCount,sum(tmp.job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(tmp.job_success_count) successJobCount ,sum(tmp.job_running_count) runningJobCount, sum(tmp.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount from (select sm.institutions,sum(js.job_failed_count) job_failed_count,sum(js.job_success_count) job_success_count,sum(js.job_running_count) job_running_count,sum(js.job_waiting_count) job_waiting_count FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} group by sm.institutions) tmp

select count(1) from (select sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} group by sm.institutions) tmp

select count(1) from (select sm.site_name FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date=#{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.institutions =#{institutions} group by sm.site_name) tmp

SELECT sm.site_name siteHostName,sm2.site_name siteGuestName,count(js.job_success_count) job_success_count,count(js.job_failed_count) job_failed_count,count(js.job_running_count) job_running_count,count(js.job_waiting_count) job_waiting_count,sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id=js.site_host_id and sm2.id=js.site_guest_id group by sm.site_name,sm2.site_name,sm.institutions

SELECT sm.site_name siteHostName,sm2.site_name siteGuestName,count(js.job_success_count) job_success_count,count(js.job_failed_count) job_failed_count,count(js.job_running_count) job_running_count,count(js.job_waiting_count) job_waiting_count,sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id=js.site_host_id and sm2.id=js.site_guest_id group by sm.site_name,sm2.site_name,sm.institutions and sm.id in (select * from (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions !=#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} and status=2 order by institutions asc,site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.pageSize} ) temp)

SELECT sm2.institutions,sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCountForInstitutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id = sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) group by sm2.institutions

SELECT (case when sm2.institutions = #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} then sm.institutions else sm2.institutions end) as institutions, sum(js.job_success_count) successJobCountForInstitutions,sum(js.job_failed_count) failedJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_running_count) runningJobCountForInstitutions, sum(js.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCountForInstitutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.site_host_id=sm2.id and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and (sm.institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} || sm2.institutions=#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions}) group by sm2.institutions ,sm.institutions order by institutions limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.pageSize}

SELECT count(1) institutionsCount,sum(tmp.job_failed_count) failedJobCount,sum(tmp.job_success_count) successJobCount,sum(tmp.job_running_count) runningJobCount,sum(tmp.job_waiting_count) waitingJobCount from (select sm.institutions,sum(js.job_failed_count) job_failed_count,sum(js.job_success_count) job_success_count,sum(js.job_running_count) job_running_count,sum(js.job_waiting_count) job_waiting_count FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id = sm.id and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by sm.institutions) tmp

select count(1) from (select sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by sm.institutions) tmp

SELECT count(1) from ( select js.site_host_id FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} group by js.site_host_id ) tmp

SELECT (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS siteHostName, (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_guest_id) AS siteGuestName, (SELECT sm.institutions FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS institutions, js.job_success_count,js.job_failed_count,js.job_running_count,js.job_waiting_count FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_host_id in ( select tmp.site_host_id from ( select js.site_host_id,sm.site_name FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id =js.site_host_id group by js.site_host_id ,sm.site_name order by sm.site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.pageSize} ) tmp )

select sm.institutions,sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm, ( select js.site_host_id,sm.site_name FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id =js.site_host_id group by js.site_host_id,sm.site_name order by sm.site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionQo.pageSize} ) tmp where sm.id=tmp.site_host_id

SELECT count(1) from ( select js.site_host_id FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} group by js.site_host_id ) tmp

SELECT (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS siteHostName, (SELECT sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_guest_id) AS siteGuestName, (SELECT sm.institutions FROM t_federated_site_manager sm WHERE sm.id = js.site_host_id) AS institutions, js.job_success_count,js.job_failed_count,js.job_running_count,js.job_waiting_count FROM t_job_statistics js where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and js.site_host_id in (select tmp.site_host_id from ( select js.site_host_id,sm.site_name FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id =js.site_host_id group by js.site_host_id,sm.site_name order by sm.site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.pageSize} ) tmp )

select sm.institutions,sm.site_name FROM t_federated_site_manager sm, ( select js.site_host_id,sm.site_name FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE} and #{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id =js.site_host_id group by js.site_host_id ,sm.site_name order by sm.site_name asc limit #{startIndex},#{jobOfSiteDimensionPeriodQo.pageSize} ) tmp where sm.id=tmp.site_host_id
